entry.value: SELECT [UFD1].[FldValue], [UFD1].[Descr], CUFD.AliasID, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS 'processing_dt' FROM [UFD1] LEFT JOIN CUFD ON UFD1.FieldID = CUFD.FieldID AND UFD1.TableID = CUFD.TableID WHERE CUFD.TableID in ('OITM' ,'ODPO')

SELECT T0.DocEntry, T0.NumAtCard, T0.DocStatus, T0.CANCELED, T0.DocDate, T0.DocTotal, T0.UpdateDate, T0.UpdateTS, T0.CardCode, T0.Address2, T0.U_DISPATCH_WH, T0.U_so_store, T0.U_deposit_date, T0.U_mage2_rcvphone, T0.U_mage2_receiver, T0.U_return_type, T0.U_m2_order_labels, T1.ItemCode, T1.Dscription, T1.PriceAfVAT, T1.Quantity, T1.GTotal, T1.ShipDate, T2.WhsName, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS 'processing_dt', T0.SupplCode, T1.WhsCode, T1.FromWhsCod, T0.U_dev_phone02, T0.CreateDate FROM ODRF T0 LEFT JOIN DRF1 T1 ON T0.DocEntry = T1.DocEntry INNER JOIN OWHS T2 ON T1.WhsCode = T2.WhsCode WHERE DATEADD(Day,-2, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) <= T0.UpdateDate OR DATEADD(Day,-2, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) <= T0.DocDate
SELECT DISTINCT T0.DocEntry FROM ODRF T0 WHERE T0.DocDate >= '2022-02-01'

SELECT T0.DocEntry, T0.NumAtCard, T0.DocStatus, T0.CANCELED, T0.DocDate, T0.DocTotal, T0.UpdateDate, T0.UpdateTS, T0.CardCode, T0.Address2, T0.U_DISPATCH_WH, T0.U_so_store, T0.U_deposit_date, T0.U_mage2_rcvphone, T0.U_mage2_receiver, T0.U_return_type, T0.U_m2_order_labels, T1.ItemCode, T1.Dscription, T1.PriceAfVAT, T1.Quantity, T1.GTotal, T1.ShipDate, T2.WhsName, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS 'processing_dt', T0.SupplCode, T1.WhsCode, T1.FromWhsCod, T0.U_dev_phone02, T0.CreateDate FROM ODRF T0 LEFT JOIN DRF1 T1 ON T0.DocEntry = T1.DocEntry INNER JOIN OWHS T2 ON T1.WhsCode = T2.WhsCode WHERE T0.DocDate >= '2022-02-01' AND T0.DocDate < '2022-12-01'
SELECT ItemCode,OnHand,IsCommited,OnOrder,WhsCode,UpdateDate, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS 'processing_dt' FROM OITW WHERE ItemCode = '${product_id}'

SELECT T0.DocEntry, T0.DocDate, T0.DocStatus, T0.CANCELED, T0.UpdateDate, T0.UpdateTS, T1.ItemCode, T1.Dscription, T2.WhsName AS 'FromWhsCod_value', T3.WhsName AS 'WhsCod_value', T1.Quantity, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS 'processing_dt', T1.FromWhsCod, T1.WhsCode
FROM OWTR T0 LEFT JOIN WTR1 T1 LEFT JOIN OWHS T2 ON T1.FromWhsCod = T2.WhsCode LEFT JOIN OWHS T3 ON T1.WhsCode = T3.WhsCode ON T0.DocEntry = T1.DocEntry WHERE DATEADD(Day,-2, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) <= T0.UpdateDate
SELECT ItemCode,OnHand,IsCommited,OnOrder,WhsCode,UpdateDate, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS 'processing_dt' FROM OITW WHERE ItemCode = '${product_id}'

SELECT T0.DocEntry, T0.DocDate, T0.DocStatus, T0.CANCELED, T0.UpdateDate, T0.UpdateTS, T1.ItemCode, T1.Dscription, T2.WhsName AS 'FromWhsCod_value', T3.WhsName AS 'WhsCod_value', T1.Quantity, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS 'processing_dt', T1.FromWhsCod, T1.WhsCode
FROM OWTR T0 LEFT JOIN WTR1 T1 LEFT JOIN OWHS T2 ON T1.FromWhsCod = T2.WhsCode LEFT JOIN OWHS T3 ON T1.WhsCode = T3.WhsCode ON T0.DocEntry = T1.DocEntry WHERE T0.DocDate >= '2022-02-01' AND T0.DocDate <= '2022-11-30'
SELECT ItemCode, OnHand, IsCommited, OnOrder, WhsCode, UpdateDate, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS 'processing_dt' FROM OITW T0
SELECT ItemCode, OnHand, IsCommited, OnOrder, WhsCode, UpdateDate, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS 'processing_dt' FROM OITW T0 WHERE DATEADD(Day,-2, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) <= T0.UpdateDate

SELECT ItemCode, OnHand, IsCommited, OnOrder, WhsCode, UpdateDate, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS 'processing_dt' FROM OITW T0 WHERE -- DATEADD(Day,-2, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) <= T0.UpdateDate ItemCode='30-0021-0-23'

SELECT ItemCode, OnHand, IsCommited, OnOrder, WhsCode, UpdateDate, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS 'processing_dt' FROM OITW T0 WHERE -- DATEADD(Day,-2, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) <= T0.UpdateDate ItemCode in ('1018635','1018636','1018637','1018638','1018639','1018640','1018641','1018642','1018643','1018644','1018645','1018646','1018647')
SELECT ItemCode,OnHand,IsCommited,OnOrder,WhsCode,UpdateDate, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS 'processing_dt' FROM OITW WHERE ItemCode = '${product_id}'
SELECT DISTINCT T1.ItemCode FROM OPDN T0 LEFT JOIN PDN1 T1 ON T0.DocEntry = T1.DocEntry WHERE DATEADD(Day,-1, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) <= T0.UpdateDate
SELECT ItemCode,OnHand,IsCommited,OnOrder,WhsCode,UpdateDate, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS 'processing_dt' FROM OITW WHERE ItemCode = '${product_id}'

SELECT T0.DocEntry, T0.DocDate, T0.DocStatus, T0.CANCELED, T0.UpdateDate, T0.UpdateTS, T0.U_mrl_eta, T0.U_pur_name, T1.ItemCode, T1.OpenQty, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS 'processing_dt' FROM OPOR T0 LEFT JOIN POR1 T1 ON T0.DocEntry = T1.DocEntry WHERE T1.OpenQty <>0
SELECT ItemCode,OnHand,IsCommited,OnOrder,WhsCode,UpdateDate, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS 'processing_dt' FROM OITW WHERE ItemCode = '${product_id}'

SELECT T0.DocEntry, T0.DocDate, T0.DocStatus, T0.CANCELED, T0.UpdateDate, T0.UpdateTS, T0.U_mrl_eta, T0.U_pur_name, T1.ItemCode, T1.OpenQty, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS 'processing_dt' FROM OPOR T0 LEFT JOIN POR1 T1 ON T0.DocEntry = T1.DocEntry WHERE T0.DocDate >= '2022-02-01' AND T0.DocDate <= '2022-11-30'

WITH CTE_A AS ( SELECT DISTINCT T0.BaseEntry FROM DLN1 T0 LEFT JOIN ODLN T1 ON T0.DocEntry = T1.DocEntry WHERE T1.NumAtCard = '${order_id}'
) -- SELECT T0.DocEntry, T0.NumAtCard, T0.DocStatus, T0.CANCELED, T0.DocDate, T0.DocTotal, T0.UpdateDate, T0.UpdateTS, T0.CardCode, T0.Address2, T0.U_m2_order_labels, T0.U_so_store, T0.U_deposit_date, T0.U_so_deposit, T0.U_saman, T0.U_mage2_rcvphone, T0.U_mage2_receiver, T1.ItemCode, T1.Dscription, T1.PriceAfVAT, T1.Quantity, T1.GTotal, T1.ShipDate, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS 'processing_dt', T0.U_GUI_EMail, T0.U_DISPATCH_WH, T1.GPBefDisc, T1.Text, T1.LineTotal, T1.U_item_ldeli, T1.OpenQty, T1.U_wh_update_ldeli, T1.WhsCode, T1.U_m2_ItemDiscount, T1.U_group_tag, T1.U_group_parent_id, T1.LineNum FROM ORDR T0 LEFT JOIN RDR1 T1 ON T0.DocEntry = T1.DocEntry WHERE T0.DocEntry IN ( SELECT BaseEntry FROM CTE_A )
SELECT ItemCode,OnHand,IsCommited,OnOrder,WhsCode,UpdateDate, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS 'processing_dt' FROM OITW WHERE ItemCode = '${product_id}'

SELECT T0.DocEntry, T0.NumAtCard, T0.DocStatus, T0.CANCELED, T0.DocDate, T0.DocTotal, T0.UpdateDate, T0.UpdateTS, T0.CardCode, T0.Address2, T0.U_DISPATCH_WH, T0.U_so_store, T0.U_deposit_date, T0.U_mage2_rcvphone, T0.U_mage2_receiver, T0.U_return_type, T0.U_m2_order_labels, T1.ItemCode, T1.Dscription, T1.PriceAfVAT, T1.Quantity, T1.GTotal, T1.ShipDate, T2.WhsName, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS 'processing_dt', T0.SupplCode FROM ODRF T0 LEFT JOIN DRF1 T1 ON T0.DocEntry = T1.DocEntry INNER JOIN OWHS T2 ON T1.WhsCode = T2.WhsCode WHERE T0.NumAtCard = '${order_id}'

WITH _t AS ( SELECT DISTINCT NumAtCard FROM ODLN WHERE DATEADD(Day,-2, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) <= ODLN.UpdateDate OR DATEADD(Day,-2, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) <= ODLN.DocDate ) SELECT T0.DocEntry, T0.NumAtCard, T0.DocStatus, T0.CANCELED, T0.DocDate, T0.DocTotal, T0.UpdateDate, T0.UpdateTS, T0.CardCode, T0.Address2, T0.U_DISPATCH_WH, T0.U_so_store, T0.U_deposit_date, T0.U_mage2_rcvphone, T0.U_mage2_receiver, T0.U_return_type, T0.U_m2_order_labels, T1.ItemCode, T1.Dscription, T1.PriceAfVAT, T1.Quantity, T1.GTotal, T1.ShipDate, T2.WhsName, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS 'processing_dt', T0.SupplCode, T1.WhsCode, T0.U_dev_phone02, T0.CreateDate, T1.U_m2_ItemID, T1.U_group_parent_id, T1.U_group_tag FROM ODLN T0 LEFT JOIN DLN1 T1 ON T0.DocEntry = T1.DocEntry INNER JOIN OWHS T2 ON T1.WhsCode = T2.WhsCode WHERE T0.NumAtCard IN ( SELECT NumAtCard FROM _t )

inputPorts.name: ODLN_update
inputPorts.validationErrors: 'Port 'ODLN_update'' is invalid because Port has no incoming connections

entry.value: SELECT T0.DocEntry, T0.NumAtCard, T0.DocStatus, T0.CANCELED, T0.DocDate, T0.DocTotal, T0.UpdateDate, T0.UpdateTS, T0.CardCode, T0.Address2, T0.U_DISPATCH_WH, T0.U_so_store, T0.U_deposit_date, T0.U_mage2_rcvphone, T0.U_mage2_receiver, T0.U_return_type, T0.U_m2_order_labels, T1.ItemCode, T1.Dscription, T1.PriceAfVAT, T1.Quantity, T1.GTotal, T1.ShipDate, T2.WhsName, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS 'processing_dt', T0.SupplCode FROM ODRF T0 LEFT JOIN DRF1 T1 ON T0.DocEntry = T1.DocEntry INNER JOIN OWHS T2 ON T1.WhsCode = T2.WhsCode WHERE T0.NumAtCard = '${order_id}'

inputPorts.name: ODLN_update

entry.value:
WITH CTE_A AS ( SELECT DISTINCT T0.BaseEntry FROM DLN1 T0 LEFT JOIN ODLN T1 ON T0.DocEntry = T1.DocEntry WHERE T1.NumAtCard = '${order_id}'
) -- SELECT T0.DocEntry, T0.NumAtCard, T0.DocStatus, T0.CANCELED, T0.DocDate, T0.DocTotal, T0.UpdateDate, T0.UpdateTS, T0.CardCode, T0.Address2, T0.U_m2_order_labels, T0.U_so_store, T0.U_deposit_date, T0.U_so_deposit, T0.U_saman, T0.U_mage2_rcvphone, T0.U_mage2_receiver, T1.ItemCode, T1.Dscription, T1.PriceAfVAT, T1.Quantity, T1.GTotal, T1.ShipDate, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS 'processing_dt', T0.U_GUI_EMail, T0.U_DISPATCH_WH, T1.GPBefDisc, T1.Text, T1.LineTotal, T1.U_item_ldeli, T1.OpenQty, T1.U_wh_update_ldeli, T1.WhsCode, T1.U_m2_ItemDiscount FROM ORDR T0 LEFT JOIN RDR1 T1 ON T0.DocEntry = T1.DocEntry WHERE T0.DocEntry IN ( SELECT BaseEntry FROM CTE_A )

inputPorts.name: ODLN_update
inputPorts.validationErrors: 'Port 'ODLN_update'' is invalid because Port has no incoming connections

entry.value: WITH _t AS ( SELECT DISTINCT NumAtCard FROM ODLN -- WHERE -- NumAtCard = '220206569020' -- DATEADD(Day,-2, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) <= ODLN.UpdateDate OR -- DATEADD(Day,-2, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) <= ODLN.DocDate ) SELECT T0.DocEntry, T0.NumAtCard, T0.DocStatus, T0.CANCELED, T0.DocDate, T0.DocTotal, T0.UpdateDate, T0.UpdateTS, T0.CardCode, T0.Address2, T0.U_DISPATCH_WH, T0.U_so_store, T0.U_deposit_date, T0.U_mage2_rcvphone, T0.U_mage2_receiver, T0.U_return_type, T0.U_m2_order_labels, T1.ItemCode, T1.Dscription, T1.PriceAfVAT, T1.Quantity, T1.GTotal, T1.ShipDate, T2.WhsName, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS 'processing_dt', T0.SupplCode, T1.WhsCode, T0.U_dev_phone02, T0.CreateDate, T1.U_m2_ItemID, T1.U_group_parent_id, T1.U_group_tag FROM ODLN T0 LEFT JOIN DLN1 T1 ON T0.DocEntry = T1.DocEntry INNER JOIN OWHS T2 ON T1.WhsCode = T2.WhsCode WHERE T0.NumAtCard IN ( SELECT NumAtCard FROM _t ) AND T1.U_m2_ItemID <> ''

SELECT T0.DocEntry, T0.NumAtCard, T0.DocStatus, T0.CANCELED, T0.DocDate, T0.DocTotal, T0.UpdateDate, T0.UpdateTS, T0.CardCode, T0.Address2, T0.U_DISPATCH_WH, T0.U_so_store, T0.U_deposit_date, T0.U_mage2_rcvphone, T0.U_mage2_receiver, T0.U_return_type, T0.U_m2_order_labels, T1.ItemCode, T1.Dscription, T1.PriceAfVAT, T1.Quantity, T1.GTotal, T1.ShipDate, T2.WhsName, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS 'processing_dt', T0.SupplCode, T1.WhsCode, T0.U_dev_phone02, T0.CreateDate FROM ODLN T0 LEFT JOIN DLN1 T1 ON T0.DocEntry = T1.DocEntry INNER JOIN OWHS T2 ON T1.WhsCode = T2.WhsCode WHERE T0.DocDate >= '2022-02-01' AND T0.DocDate < '2022-12-01' -- WHERE T0.DocEntry = 520

entry.value: SELECT ItemCode, PriceList, Currency, Price, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS 'processing_dt' FROM ITM1 WHERE Price != 0
SELECT T0.CardCode, T0.CardType, T0.CardName, T0.E_Mail FROM OCRD T0 WHERE T0.CardType = 'S'

SELECT T0.DocEntry, T0.NumAtCard, T0.U_m2_shipdate, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS 'processing_dt'
FROM ORDR T0 -- LEFT JOIN RDR1 T1 -- ON T0.DocEntry = T1.DocEntry WHERE T0.CardCode IN (SELECT CardCode FROM OCRD WHERE OCRD.[U_dis_platform] = 0) AND T0.CANCELED = 'N'
SELECT ItemCode,OnHand,IsCommited,OnOrder,WhsCode,UpdateDate, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS 'processing_dt' FROM OITW WHERE ItemCode = '${product_id}'

SELECT T0.DocEntry, T0.NumAtCard, T0.DocStatus, T0.CANCELED, T0.DocDate, T0.DocTotal, T0.UpdateDate, T0.UpdateTS, T0.CardCode, T0.Address2, T0.U_DISPATCH_WH, T0.U_so_store, T0.U_deposit_date, T0.U_mage2_rcvphone, T0.U_mage2_receiver, T0.U_return_type, T0.U_m2_order_labels, T1.ItemCode, T1.Dscription, T1.PriceAfVAT, T1.Quantity, T1.GTotal, T1.ShipDate, T2.WhsName, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS 'processing_dt', T0.SupplCode FROM ODRF T0 LEFT JOIN DRF1 T1 ON T0.DocEntry = T1.DocEntry INNER JOIN OWHS T2 ON T1.WhsCode = T2.WhsCode WHERE T0.NumAtCard = '${order_id}'

WITH _t AS ( SELECT DISTINCT NumAtCard FROM ORDN WHERE DATEADD(Day,-2, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) <= ORDN.UpdateDate ) SELECT T0.DocEntry, T0.NumAtCard, T0.DocStatus, T0.DocNum, T0.CANCELED, T0.DocDate, T0.DocTotal, T0.UpdateDate, T0.UpdateTS, T0.CardCode, T0.Address2, T0.U_so_store, T0.U_mage2_rcvphone, T0.U_mage2_receiver, T0.U_return_type, T1.ItemCode, T1.Dscription, T1.PriceAfVAT, T1.Quantity, T1.GTotal, T1.ShipDate, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS 'processing_dt', T0.U_DISPATCH_WH, T2.WhsName, T0.SupplCode, T1.WhsCode, T1.U_group_parent_id FROM ORDN T0 LEFT JOIN RDN1 T1 ON T0.DocEntry = T1.DocEntry INNER JOIN OWHS T2 ON T1.WhsCode = T2.WhsCode WHERE T0.NumAtCard IN ( SELECT NumAtCard FROM _t )

SELECT T0.DocEntry, T0.NumAtCard, T0.DocStatus, T0.CANCELED, T0.DocDate, T0.DocTotal, T0.UpdateDate, T0.UpdateTS, T0.CardCode, T0.Address2, T0.U_DISPATCH_WH, T0.U_so_store, T0.U_deposit_date, T0.U_mage2_rcvphone, T0.U_mage2_receiver, T0.U_return_type, T0.U_m2_order_labels, T1.ItemCode, T1.Dscription, T1.PriceAfVAT, T1.Quantity, T1.GTotal, T1.ShipDate, T2.WhsName, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS 'processing_dt', T0.SupplCode FROM ODRF T0 LEFT JOIN DRF1 T1 ON T0.DocEntry = T1.DocEntry INNER JOIN OWHS T2 ON T1.WhsCode = T2.WhsCode WHERE T0.NumAtCard = '${order_id}'

SELECT T0.DocEntry, T0.NumAtCard, T0.DocStatus, T0.DocNum, T0.CANCELED, T0.DocDate, T0.DocTotal, T0.UpdateDate, T0.UpdateTS, T0.CardCode, T0.Address2, T0.U_so_store, T0.U_mage2_rcvphone, T0.U_mage2_receiver, T0.U_return_type, T1.ItemCode, T1.Dscription, T1.PriceAfVAT, T1.Quantity, T1.GTotal, T1.ShipDate, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS 'processing_dt', T0.U_DISPATCH_WH, T2.WhsName, T0.SupplCode, T1.WhsCode FROM ORDN T0 LEFT JOIN RDN1 T1 ON T0.DocEntry = T1.DocEntry INNER JOIN OWHS T2 ON T1.WhsCode = T2.WhsCode WHERE T0.DocDate >= '2022-02-01'

SELECT T1.DocNum, T1.NumAtCard, T1.CardCode, T1.CardName, T0.DocDate, T0.UpdateDate, T0.UpdateTs, T0.U_paid_store, T0.U_paid_type, T0.U_paid_id, T0.U_voucher, T0.CashSum, T0.U_pay_installment, "@TGUIBRN"."U_CompnyName", "@TGUIBRN"."U_TaxIdNum", T1.U_IN_BSINV, T1.U_IN_BSDAT, T1.U_IN_BSCNO, T1.U_IN_BSNOT, T1.U_IN_BSAMN, T1.U_IN_BSTAX, T1.U_FreeAMN, T1.U_GUI_PrintMK, T1.U_GUI_CarrierType, T1.U_GUI_CarrierId1, T1.U_GUI_DonaCode, T1.U_GrpDscr, T0.Canceled, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS 'processing_dt'
FROM ORCT T0 LEFT JOIN ODPI T1 ON T1.ReceiptNum = T0.DocEntry LEFT JOIN "@TGUIBRN" ON "@TGUIBRN".DocNum = T1.U_ALL_BRANC WHERE NOT(T1.U_IN_BSDAT IS NULL AND T0.DocDate IS NULL) AND (DATEADD(Day,-2, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) <= T1.DocDate OR DATEADD(Day,-2, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) <= T1.UpdateDate OR DATEADD(Day,-2, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) <= T1.U_IN_BSDAT OR DATEADD(Day,-2, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) <= T0.UpdateDate OR DATEADD(Day,-2, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) <= T0.DocDate)

SELECT T1.DocNum, T1.NumAtCard, T1.CardCode, T1.CardName, T0.DocDate, T0.UpdateDate, T0.UpdateTs, T0.U_paid_store, T0.U_paid_type, T0.U_paid_id, T0.U_voucher, T0.CashSum, T0.U_pay_installment, "@TGUIBRN"."U_CompnyName", "@TGUIBRN"."U_TaxIdNum", T1.U_IN_BSINV, T1.U_IN_BSDAT, T1.U_IN_BSCNO, T1.U_IN_BSNOT, T1.U_IN_BSAMN, T1.U_IN_BSTAX, T1.U_FreeAMN, T1.U_GUI_PrintMK, T1.U_GUI_CarrierType, T1.U_GUI_CarrierId1, T1.U_GUI_DonaCode, T1.U_GrpDscr, T0.Canceled, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS 'processing_dt'
FROM ORCT T0 LEFT JOIN ODPI T1 ON T1.ReceiptNum = T0.DocEntry LEFT JOIN "@TGUIBRN" ON "@TGUIBRN".DocNum = T1.U_ALL_BRANC WHERE NOT(T1.U_IN_BSDAT IS NULL AND T0.DocDate IS NULL)
SELECT ItemCode,OnHand,IsCommited,OnOrder,WhsCode,UpdateDate, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS 'processing_dt' FROM OITW WHERE ItemCode = '${product_id}'

SELECT T0.DocEntry, T0.DocDate, T0.DocStatus, T0.Comments, T0.CANCELED, T0.UpdateDate, T0.UpdateTS, T1.ItemCode, T1.Dscription, T1.OpenQty, T1.BlockNum, T2.WhsName AS 'FromWhsCod_value', T3.WhsName AS 'WhsCod_value', T4.SlpName, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS 'processing_dt', T1.FromWhsCod, T1.WhsCode FROM OWTQ T0 LEFT JOIN WTQ1 T1 ON T0.DocEntry = T1.DocEntry LEFT JOIN OWHS T2 ON T1.FromWhsCod = T2.WhsCode LEFT JOIN OWHS T3 ON T1.WhsCode = T3.WhsCode LEFT JOIN OSLP T4 ON T0.SlpCode = T4.SlpCode WHERE T0.DocStatus = 'O' AND T0.CANCELED = 'N'
SELECT ItemCode,OnHand,IsCommited,OnOrder,WhsCode,UpdateDate, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS 'processing_dt' FROM OITW WHERE ItemCode = '${product_id}'

SELECT T0.DocEntry, T0.DocDate, T0.DocStatus, T0.Comments, T0.CANCELED, T0.UpdateDate, T0.UpdateTS, T1.ItemCode, T1.Dscription, T1.OpenQty, T1.BlockNum, T2.WhsName AS 'FromWhsCod_value', T3.WhsName AS 'WhsCod_value', T4.SlpName, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS 'processing_dt', T1.FromWhsCod, T1.WhsCode FROM OWTQ T0 LEFT JOIN WTQ1 T1 ON T0.DocEntry = T1.DocEntry LEFT JOIN OWHS T2 ON T1.FromWhsCod = T2.WhsCode LEFT JOIN OWHS T3 ON T1.WhsCode = T3.WhsCode LEFT JOIN OSLP T4 ON T0.SlpCode = T4.SlpCode -- WHERE DATEADD(Day,-2, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) <= T0.UpdateDate WHERE T0.DocDate >= '2022-02-01'

SELECT o.increment_id, o.status, order_item.sku, order_item.name, order_item.price, order_item.qty_ordered, order_item.row_total AS 'subtotal', order_item.discount_amount, order_item.row_total + IFNULL(order_item.tax_amount,0) + IFNULL(order_item.weee_tax_applied_row_amount,0) + IFNULL(order_item.discount_tax_compensation_amount,0) - IFNULL(order_item.discount_amount,0) AS 'row_total', CASE WHEN order_item.row_total = order_item.discount_amount THEN '' WHEN order_item.name LIKE '%%' THEN '' WHEN order_item.sku = '30-0042-0-08' AND order_item.discount_amount = 1590 * order_item.qty_ordered THEN '' ELSE '' END AS 'is_free_gift', CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AS 'processing_dt' FROM sales_order o LEFT JOIN sales_order_item order_item ON o.entity_id = order_item.order_id WHERE (o.status = 'processing' OR o.status = 'complete') AND o.entity_id IN (SELECT order_id FROM sales_order_item WHERE sku IN ('30-0001-0-08', '30-0023-0-08', '30-0005-0-08', '30-0002-0-08', '30-0006-0-08', '30-0049-0-08', '30-0047-0-08', '30-0050-0-08' ,'30-0051-0-08', '30-0048-0-08')) AND o.created_at >= '2023-04-06'

SELECT T0.NumAtCard AS 'increment_id', T0.DocStatus AS 'status', T1.ItemCode AS 'sku', T1.Dscription AS 'name', T1.PriceAfVAT AS 'price', T1.Quantity AS 'qty_ordered', T1.GTotal AS 'subtotal', null AS 'discount_amount', null AS 'row_total', T1.FreeTxt AS 'is_free_gift', CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS 'processing_dt'
FROM ORDR T0 LEFT JOIN RDR1 T1 ON T0.DocEntry = T1.DocEntry WHERE T0.CardCode IN (SELECT CardCode FROM OCRD WHERE OCRD.[U_dis_platform] = 0) AND T0.CANCELED = 'N' AND T0.DocDate >= '2023-04-06'
SELECT Code, Name, U_c1_code, U_c1_name, U_c2_code, U_c2_name, U_c3_code, U_c3_name, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS 'processing_dt' FROM [dbo].[@ITEM_CATEGORY]

SELECT T0.ItemCode, T0.ItemName, T0.U_item_tag_ccode, T0.CardCode, T0.U_fbname, T0.U_woodname, T0.U_sname, T0.U_item_fcode, T0.U_item_fspec, T0.U_item_mspec01, T0.U_item_mspec02, T0.U_unit_cbm, T0.U_item_status, T0.U_item_from, T0.U_item_c1, T0.U_item_c2, T0.U_item_c3, T0.U_item_style, T0.U_fbcategory, T0.U_item_brand, T0.U_item_m01, T0.U_space_cat, T0.U_tag_ccode_ver, T0.UpdateDate, T0.UpdateTS, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS 'processing_dt', T0.INvntItem FROM OITM T0 WHERE DATEADD(Day,-2, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) <= T0.UpdateDate

SELECT T0.ItemCode, T0.ItemName, T0.U_item_tag_ccode, T0.CardCode, T0.U_fbname, T0.U_woodname, T0.U_sname, T0.U_item_fcode, T0.U_item_fspec, T0.U_item_mspec01, T0.U_item_mspec02, T0.U_unit_cbm, T0.U_item_status, T0.U_item_from, T0.U_item_c1, T0.U_item_c2, T0.U_item_c3, T0.U_item_style, T0.U_fbcategory, T0.U_item_brand, T0.U_item_m01, T0.U_space_cat, T0.U_tag_ccode_ver, T0.UpdateDate, T0.UpdateTS, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS 'processing_dt', T0.INvntItem FROM OITM T0

SELECT T0.DocEntry, T0.DocDate, T0.DocStatus, T0.CANCELED, T0.UpdateDate, T0.UpdateTS, T0.U_mrl_eta, T0.U_pur_name, T1.ItemCode, T1.Dscription, T1.Quantity, T0.CardName, T1.WhsCode, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS 'processing_dt' FROM OPDN T0 LEFT JOIN PDN1 T1 ON T0.DocEntry = T1.DocEntry WHERE DATEADD(Day,-2, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) <= T0.UpdateDate

SELECT T0.DocEntry, T0.DocDate, T0.DocStatus, T0.CANCELED, T0.UpdateDate, T0.UpdateTS, T0.U_mrl_eta, T0.U_pur_name, T1.ItemCode, T1.Dscription, T1.Quantity, T0.CardName, T1.WhsCode, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS 'processing_dt' FROM OPDN T0 LEFT JOIN PDN1 T1 ON T0.DocEntry = T1.DocEntry WHERE DATEADD(Day,-2, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) <= T0.UpdateDate

SELECT T1.DocNum, T0.DocNum AS 'OVPM_DocNum', T1.NumAtCard, T1.CardCode, T1.CardName, T1.DocDate, T1.DocTime, T1.UpdateDate, T1.UpdateTS, T0.DocDate AS OVPM_DocDate, T0.DocTime AS OVPM_DocTime, T0.U_paid_store, T0.U_paid_type, T0.U_paid_id, T0.CashSum, T0.Canceled, T1.Comments, T1.DocStatus, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS 'processing_dt' FROM OVPM T0 INNER JOIN ORIN T1 ON T1.ReceiptNum = T0.DocNum
WHERE DATEADD(Day,-7, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) <= T1.UpdateDate OR DATEADD(Day,-7, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) <= T1.DocDate OR DATEADD(Day,-7, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) <= T0.UpdateDate OR DATEADD(Day,-7, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) <= T0.DocDate

SELECT T1.DocNum, T0.DocNum AS 'OVPM_DocNum', T1.NumAtCard, T1.CardCode, T1.CardName, T1.DocDate, T1.DocTime, T1.UpdateDate, T1.UpdateTS, T0.DocDate AS OVPM_DocDate, T0.DocTime AS OVPM_DocTime, T0.U_paid_store, T0.U_paid_type, T0.U_paid_id, T0.CashSum, T0.Canceled, T1.Comments, T1.DocStatus, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS 'processing_dt' FROM OVPM T0 INNER JOIN ORIN T1 ON T1.ReceiptNum = T0.DocNum

SELECT DISTINCT T0.NumAtCard, T0.U_so_store, T1.OcrCode, T1.CogsOcrCod, T0.U_m2_order_update_ts, STUFF(( SELECT ',' + RDR1.ItemCode FROM RDR1 WHERE RDR1.DocEntry = T0.DocEntry FOR XML PATH('') ), 1, 1, '') AS ItemCodeNote, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS 'processing_dt' FROM ORDR T0 LEFT JOIN RDR1 T1 ON T0.DocEntry = T1.DocEntry WHERE (LEFT(T0.U_so_store, 3) != T1.OcrCode OR LEFT(T0.U_so_store, 3) != T1.CogsOcrCod) AND T0.DocStatus = 'O' AND T0.CANCELED = 'N'

SELECT orders.entity_id, orders.increment_id, addresses.region, addresses.city, area.area_name, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AS 'processing_dt' FROM sales_order AS orders LEFT JOIN sales_order_address AS addresses ON orders.entity_id = addresses.parent_id LEFT JOIN mageworx_order_base_device_data AS area ON orders.entity_id = area.order_id WHERE orders.increment_id = '${order_id}' AND addresses.address_type = 'shipping'
SELECT DISTINCT NumAtCard FROM FLowfile WHERE NumAtCard NOT LIKE '%RE%' AND NumAtCard NOT LIKE '%T%' AND NumAtCard NOT LIKE '%PC%' AND NumAtCard NOT LIKE '%MO%'
SELECT ItemCode,OnHand,IsCommited,OnOrder,WhsCode,UpdateDate, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS 'processing_dt' FROM OITW WHERE ItemCode = '${product_id}'

SELECT DISTINCT ItemCode FROM ( SELECT *, DENSE_RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY DocEntry ORDER BY processing_dt DESC) row_number FROM `czechrepublic-290206.mid_Prod.dup_midORDR_RDR1` ) WHERE (row_number = 1 OR row_number = 2) AND NumAtCard= '${order_id}' AND ItemCode != 'shippingFees000' AND ItemCode != 'discount000'

SELECT T0.DocEntry, T0.NumAtCard, T0.DocStatus, T0.CANCELED, T0.DocDate, T0.DocTotal, T0.UpdateDate, T0.UpdateTS, T0.CardCode, T0.Address2, T0.U_m2_order_labels, T0.U_so_store, T0.U_deposit_date, T0.U_so_deposit, T0.U_saman, T0.U_mage2_rcvphone, T0.U_mage2_receiver, T1.ItemCode, T1.Dscription, T1.PriceAfVAT, T1.Quantity, T1.GTotal, T1.ShipDate, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS 'processing_dt', T0.U_GUI_EMail, T0.U_DISPATCH_WH, T1.GPBefDisc, T1.Text, T1.LineTotal, T1.U_item_ldeli, T1.OpenQty, T1.U_wh_update_ldeli, T1.WhsCode, T1.U_m2_ItemDiscount, T1.U_group_tag, T1.U_group_parent_id, T1.LineNum FROM ORDR T0 LEFT JOIN RDR1 T1 ON T0.DocEntry = T1.DocEntry WHERE DATEADD(Day,-2, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) <= T0.UpdateDate ORDER BY T1.ItemCode

SELECT orders.entity_id, orders.increment_id, addresses.region, addresses.city, area.area_name, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AS 'processing_dt' FROM sales_order AS orders LEFT JOIN sales_order_address AS addresses ON orders.entity_id = addresses.parent_id LEFT JOIN mageworx_order_base_device_data AS area ON orders.entity_id = area.order_id WHERE orders.increment_id = '${order_id}' AND addresses.address_type = 'shipping'
SELECT DISTINCT NumAtCard FROM FLowfile WHERE NumAtCard NOT LIKE '%RE%' AND NumAtCard NOT LIKE '%T%' AND NumAtCard NOT LIKE '%PC%' AND NumAtCard NOT LIKE '%MO%'

inputPorts.name: ORDR_update
inputPorts.validationErrors: 'Port 'ORDR_update'' is invalid because Port has no incoming connections

entry.value: SELECT ItemCode,OnHand,IsCommited,OnOrder,WhsCode,UpdateDate, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS 'processing_dt' FROM OITW WHERE ItemCode = '${product_id}'

SELECT DISTINCT ItemCode FROM ( SELECT *, DENSE_RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY DocEntry ORDER BY processing_dt DESC) row_number FROM `czechrepublic-290206.mid_Prod.dup_midORDR_RDR1` ) WHERE (row_number = 1 OR row_number = 2) AND NumAtCard= '${order_id}' AND ItemCode != 'shippingFees000' AND ItemCode != 'discount000'

SELECT T0.DocEntry, T0.NumAtCard, T0.DocStatus, T0.CANCELED, T0.DocDate, T0.DocTotal, T0.UpdateDate, T0.UpdateTS, T0.CardCode, T0.Address2, T0.U_m2_order_labels, T0.U_so_store, T0.U_deposit_date, T0.U_so_deposit, T0.U_saman, T0.U_mage2_rcvphone, T0.U_mage2_receiver, T1.ItemCode, T1.Dscription, T1.PriceAfVAT, T1.Quantity, T1.GTotal, T1.ShipDate, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS 'processing_dt', T0.U_GUI_EMail, T0.U_DISPATCH_WH, T1.GPBefDisc, T1.Text, T1.LineTotal, T1.U_item_ldeli, T1.OpenQty, T1.U_wh_update_ldeli, T1.WhsCode, T1.U_m2_ItemDiscount, T1.U_group_tag, T1.U_group_parent_id, T1.LineNum FROM ORDR T0 LEFT JOIN RDR1 T1 ON T0.DocEntry = T1.DocEntry WHERE -- DATEADD(Day,-2, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) <= T0.UpdateDate T0.NumAtCard in ('ZZ20241024443591','241018399106','241024719205','241021957126','241012888171','241026842069','240917117085','240928002109','241022259098','241019488064','241029338153','241006364029','241029092088','240909074001','241026501043','240929361103','241027673014','241013705104') ORDER BY T1.ItemCode
